actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to extend the interest rate limitation on debt entered into during military service to debt incurred during military service to consolidate or refinance student loans incurred before military service.
short_title: Servicemember Student Loan Affordability Act of 2020

summary.text:
Servicemember Student Loan Affordability Act of 2020

This bill extends the 6% interest rate limitation on debt entered into during a service member's military service to any debt entered into to consolidate or refinance one or more student loans incurred before such service.

titles.title: Servicemember Student Loan Affordability Act of 2020
Servicemember Student Loan Affordability Act of 2020

A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to extend the interest rate limitation on debt entered into during military service to debt incurred during military service to consolidate or refinance student loans incurred before military service.
